subject: Now it says "gypsie"!
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
As if we need more debunker fodder! But now I hear "gypsie F----ed the
horizon"  off the tape. I don't know what the answer is, I get enough to
show this is real, but I also get enough to make me want to throw my hands
up to grab a big hammer!

 F-S

As i  we need mo e debunke odde ! Bu now I hea "gypsie F----ed he ho izon"  o he ape. I don' know wha he answe is, I ge enough o show his is eal, bu I also ge enough o make me wan o h ow my hands up o g ab a big hamme ! 

 
 F-S
